Html:
Hi just a quick question, I was wondering if trinket use was taken into account.

As a Healadin I like the idea of the instant cast heal of Living Ice Crystals
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=40532

but the healadin module rates this trinket particularly poorly with no burst healing at all?

Cheers

Even if that use was modelled, its a very very small amount of healing compared to what a paladin can put out. When you are doing 5000 hps, a trinket that does 2710/60 = 45 hps seems very insignificant. Yeah, its extra burst, but its only available once every 60 seconds.
